org.assertj.android.api.widget

Class TextViewAssert

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • org.assertj.android.api.view.AbstractViewAssert<S,A>
        • org.assertj.android.api.widget.AbstractTextViewAssert<TextViewAssert,android.widget.TextView>
          • org.assertj.android.api.widget.TextViewAssert

  • public final class TextViewAssert
extends AbstractTextViewAssert<TextViewAssert,android.widget.TextView>
    Assertions for TextView instances.

    This class is final. To extend use AbstractTextViewAssert.
